fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Social Solidarity Economy, Social Business Initiatives, Circular economy, Social Economy, Cooperatives, Social Rights Pillars, CAP
organisation_name: RIPESS EU Solidarity Economy Europe (RIPESS EU)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: RIPESS EU - Solidarity Economy Europe is member of the RIPESS Intercontinental network (http://www.ripess.org)
goals__remit: RIPESS Europe is an umbrella of the organisations promoting the Social Solidarity Economy, aiming at the exchange of best practices and the development of active, responsible European citizenship in solidarity with the rest of the global population and future generations. The Association represents all European members at meetings of the Réseau Intercontinental de Promotion de l’Économie Sociale Solidaire (Intercontinental Network for Social  Solidarity Economy).
